languages.text: "Он впал в схизму, оспорил священные границы, проложенные для Знания. Благословенный Амарнат утверждал, что пределы дозволенного должны быть расширены, потому что, отказываясь от постижения в определенных областях, мы презреваем Седьмой {g|Encyclopedia:UniversalLaws}Универсальный Закон{/g} — Познание есть Ключ ко всему".

traits.locale_text: "Он впал в схизму, оспорил священные границы, проложенные для Знания. Благословенный Амарнат утверждал, что пределы дозволенного должны быть расширены, потому что, отказываясь от постижения в определенных областях, мы презреваем Седьмой {g|Encyclopedia:UniversalLaws}Универсальный Закон{/g} — Познание есть Ключ ко всему".
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: "He fell into schism and challenged the sacred boundaries of Knowledge. The blessed Amarnat claimed the limits of what is permitted must be expanded, because by refusing to explore certain lore we find ourselves in contempt of the Seventh {g|Encyclopedia:UniversalLaws}Universal Law{/g}: 'Comprehension is the key to all things.'"
languages.original_text: "Он впал в схизму, оспорил священные границы, проложенные для Знания. Благословенный Амарнат утверждал, что пределы дозволенного должны быть расширены, потому что, отказываясь от постижения в определенных областях, мы презреваем Седьмой {g|Encyclopedia:UniversalLaws}Универсальный Закон{/g} — Познание есть Ключ ко всему".

Blessed Amarnat claimed the limits of what is permitted must be extended, because by refusing to explore certain lore we find ourselves in contempt of the Seventh {g|Encyclopedia:UniversalLaws}Universal Law{/g} — Comprehension is the key to all things."

The blessed Amarnat claimed the limits of what is permitted must be expanded, because by refusing to explore certain lore we find ourselves in contempt of the Seventh {g|Encyclopedia:UniversalLaws}Universal Law{/g}: 'Comprehension is the key to all things.'"
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: “他引发了分裂，挑战了知识的神圣界限。蒙福者阿玛纳特声称，所有允许的范围必须进行扩大。因为，如果我们拒绝探索某些知识，就相当于违背了{g|Encyclopedia:UniversalLaws}普适准则{/g}的第七条：‘理解力是一切事物的关键。’”
languages.original_text: "He fell into schism and challenged the sacred boundaries of Knowledge. The blessed Amarnat claimed the limits of what is permitted must be expanded, because by refusing to explore certain lore we find ourselves in contempt of the Seventh {g|Encyclopedia:UniversalLaws}Universal Law{/g}: 'Comprehension is the key to all things.'"

traits.locale_text: “他引发了分裂，挑战了知识的神圣界限。蒙福者阿玛纳特声称，所有允许的范围必须进行扩大。因为，如果我们拒绝探索某些知识，就相当于违背了{g|Encyclopedia:UniversalLaws}普适准则{/g}的第七条：‘理解力是一切事物的关键。’”
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: «Cayó en el cisma y desafío los límites sagrados del conocimiento. El bendito Amarnat afirmaba que había que expandir los límites de lo permitido, ya que al negarnos a explorar ciertos conocimientos estamos contraviniendo la séptima {g|Encyclopedia:UniversalLaws}Ley Universal{/g}: "La comprensión es la clave de todas las cosas"».
languages.original_text: "He fell into schism and challenged the sacred boundaries of Knowledge. The blessed Amarnat claimed the limits of what is permitted must be expanded, because by refusing to explore certain lore we find ourselves in contempt of the Seventh {g|Encyclopedia:UniversalLaws}Universal Law{/g}: 'Comprehension is the key to all things.'"

traits.locale_text: «Cayó en el cisma y desafío los límites sagrados del conocimiento. El bendito Amarnat afirmaba que había que expandir los límites de lo permitido, ya que al negarnos a explorar ciertos conocimientos estamos contraviniendo la séptima {g|Encyclopedia:UniversalLaws}Ley Universal{/g}: "La comprensión es la clave de todas las cosas"».
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: 「彼は分裂に陥り、知識の神聖な境界線に挑戦した。祝福されしアマルナトは、許されることの限界を広げなければならないと主張した。なぜなら、ある伝承を探求することを拒むことによって、私たち自身が第七の{g|Encyclopedia:UniversalLaws}宇宙法{/g}、すなわち『理解はあらゆることの鍵である』という法則を軽んじていることに気づくからである」
languages.original_text: "He fell into schism and challenged the sacred boundaries of Knowledge. The blessed Amarnat claimed the limits of what is permitted must be expanded, because by refusing to explore certain lore we find ourselves in contempt of the Seventh {g|Encyclopedia:UniversalLaws}Universal Law{/g}: 'Comprehension is the key to all things.'"

traits.locale_text: 「彼は分裂に陥り、知識の神聖な境界線に挑戦した。祝福されしアマルナトは、許されることの限界を広げなければならないと主張した。なぜなら、ある伝承を探求することを拒むことによって、私たち自身が第七の{g|Encyclopedia:UniversalLaws}宇宙法{/g}、すなわち『理解はあらゆることの鍵である』という法則を軽んじていることに気づくからである」
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: "Er ist der Spaltung anheimgefallen und hat die heiligen Grenzen des Wissens angezweifelt. Der gesegnete Amarnat sagte, die Grenzen des Erlaubten müssten verschoben werden. Denn indem wir uns weigern, gewisses Wissen zu erkunden, verstoßen wir gegen das Siebte {g|Encyclopedia:UniversalLaws}Universalgesetz{/g}: 'Das Begreifen ist der Schlüssel zu allen Dingen.'"
languages.original_text: "He fell into schism and challenged the sacred boundaries of Knowledge. The blessed Amarnat claimed the limits of what is permitted must be expanded, because by refusing to explore certain lore we find ourselves in contempt of the Seventh {g|Encyclopedia:UniversalLaws}Universal Law{/g}: 'Comprehension is the key to all things.'"

traits.locale_text: "Er ist der Spaltung anheimgefallen und hat die heiligen Grenzen des Wissens angezweifelt. Der gesegnete Amarnat sagte, die Grenzen des Erlaubten müssten verschoben werden. Denn indem wir uns weigern, gewisses Wissen zu erkunden, verstoßen wir gegen das Siebte {g|Encyclopedia:UniversalLaws}Universalgesetz{/g}: 'Das Begreifen ist der Schlüssel zu allen Dingen.'"
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: « Il est tombé dans le schisme et a défié les limites sacrées de la Connaissance. Amarnat le béni prétendait que les limites autorisées devaient être élargies, car en refusant d'explorer certaines informations, nous enfreignons la septième {g|Encyclopedia:UniversalLaws}Loi Universelle{/g}, à savoir : "La Compréhension est la clé de toutes choses". »
languages.original_text: "He fell into schism and challenged the sacred boundaries of Knowledge. The blessed Amarnat claimed the limits of what is permitted must be expanded, because by refusing to explore certain lore we find ourselves in contempt of the Seventh {g|Encyclopedia:UniversalLaws}Universal Law{/g}: 'Comprehension is the key to all things.'"

traits.locale_text: « Il est tombé dans le schisme et a défié les limites sacrées de la Connaissance. Amarnat le béni prétendait que les limites autorisées devaient être élargies, car en refusant d'explorer certaines informations, nous enfreignons la septième {g|Encyclopedia:UniversalLaws}Loi Universelle{/g}, à savoir : "La Compréhension est la clé de toutes choses". »
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.original_text: "He fell into schism and challenged the sacred boundaries of Knowledge. The blessed Amarnat claimed the limits of what is permitted must be expanded, because by refusing to explore certain lore we find ourselves in contempt of the Seventh Universal Law: 'Comprehension is the key to all things.'"

languages.text: "Bölünme tuzağına düştü ve İrfanın kutsal sınırlarına meydan okudu. Kutsanmış Amarnat, izin verilen sınırların genişletilmesini talep etti. Talebinin sebebi de belli yazıtların araştırılmasını reddettiğimizde kendimizi Yedinci {g|Encyclopedia:UniversalLaws}Evrensel Yasa'da{/g} geçen 'Her şeyin anahtarı İdraktır.' ifadesine karşı gelmiş olarak bulmamızdı."
languages.original_text: "He fell into schism and challenged the sacred boundaries of Knowledge. The blessed Amarnat claimed the limits of what is permitted must be expanded, because by refusing to explore certain lore we find ourselves in contempt of the Seventh {g|Encyclopedia:UniversalLaws}Universal Law{/g}: 'Comprehension is the key to all things.'"

traits.locale_text: "Bölünme tuzağına düştü ve İrfanın kutsal sınırlarına meydan okudu. Kutsanmış Amarnat, izin verilen sınırların genişletilmesi iddiasındaydı çünkü belli yazıtların araştırılmasını reddettiğimizde, kendimizi Yedinci {g|Encyclopedia:UniversalLaws}Evrensel Yasa{/g}'ya karşı gelmiş olarak buluruz: 'Her şeyin anahtarı İdraktır.'"
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion
